Description: This is a used Epiphone Les Paul Custom Prophecy Plus in nice condition. The neck is straight and frets show no wear, Electronics work as they shouldand the EMG's sound excellent. I didn't find any bumps, nicks, scratches on this guitar yet it has been sitting around my house for years. I bought this guitar off e bay but I can't remember what year it was made. Looks to me like the neck could have been painted at some time but it was like that when I bought it. Maybe not I don't know. This guitar was strung and professionally set up on 10/23/18 so it is ready to play and it plays and sounds great. Auction starts at $0.99 with no reserve. I don't have a case or gig bag but it will be packed very well. Look at the pictures and ask any questions you may have- just mail me. Thank you..On Oct-28-18 at 07:35:51 PDT, seller added the following information: Bidders with 0 feedback contact me before bidding. I do not list guitars for the fun of listing them.I expect the winning bidder to pay. Thank youOn Oct-29-18 at 19:36:13 PDT, seller added the following information: Bidders are asking me if this guitar had neck repair do to neck being painted. I don't know if it had repairs done to the neck because I bought it used just like it is. I never payed any attention to the neck except the color is a bit off and now I have looked the neck over real good and I see no flaws or any evidence of a repair any where on the neck.
Title: Epiphone Les Paul Custom Prophecy Plus Electric Guitar
